Search: id:a057457

%I A057457
%S A057457 12,37,157,919,7193,72727,919913,14161729,259336153,5545806481,
%T A057457 136395369829,3809491708961,119543903707171
%N A057457 Prime recurrence: a(n+1) = a(n)-th prime, with a(1) = 12.
%C A057457 _Lubomir Alexandrov_ informs me that he studied this sequence in his 1965 notebook. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 23 2008.
%H A057457 Lubomir Alexandrov, <a href="http://www1.jinr.ru/Preprints/2002/055(E5-2002-55).pdf">Prime Number Sequences And Matrices Generated By Counting Arithmetic Functions</a>, Communications of the Joint Institute of Nuclear Research, E5-2002-55, Dubna, 2002.
%t A057457 NestList[ Prime, 12, 11 ]
%Y A057457 Cf. A007097.
%K A057457 nonn,hard,more
%O A057457 1,1
%A A057457 _Robert G. Wilson v_, Sep 26 2000
%E A057457 a(13) from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Oct 01 2014
